org.webcurator.core.reader
Interface LogProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArcDigitalAssetStoreService, HarvestAgentHeritrix
public interface LogProvider

The LogProvider is implemented by an object that provides access to log and report files.

Author:
nwaight
